metadata.title: CVE-2022-41794 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A heap based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the PSD thumbnailresource parsing code of OpenImageIO 2.3.19.0. A specially-crafted PSD filecan lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a maliciousfile to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
